Issue.creator: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Issue.summary: Fabric Peer - able to instantiate same chaincode version again and again
Issue.description: Should get an error when sending a request to instantiate the same chaincode and version. As of commit 901579035d407cdec03420b2dc36f80656dea2b9 a repeated instantiate will succeed and re-execute the "init" method.
